p.s: I read an excerpt of your speech of the COP26 of the year 2021.
You were right about the statement that our anger will be greater if you failed.
You had several times the opportunity to act.
First 2011 in Copenhagen, then 2016 in Paris and 2021 in Glasgow and you failed each time.
You were right however about the requirements you had the technology, the ideas, the NGOs and even the bankers and corporations, did you still failed to seize the opportunity.
Since everybody else was (NGOs, technology etc.) ready, why were not you?

You were also right that 2021 was a turning point in history, it turned for the worse and the allusion to a doomsday device, is now like a macabre sake, since you had the opportunity to cut the wires yet you didn't, but not because you could not, but because you simply did not want to.
You could have invested in electrical cars, green energy like wind, so why didn't you?
Many cooperationscoperations turned green by for example exchanging plastic packages with paper ones or by using eco-friendly production methods.
